data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Qyzylorda, Kazakhstan that you have set your Son over all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked.
data.verse: he raised Christ from the dead and seated him at his right hand in the heavenly realms, far above all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked, not only in the present age but also in the one to come.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Qyzylorda, Kazakhstan
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 212 believers in the state of Qyzylorda.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 170 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, convict the 212 believers in Qyzylorda to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
Spirit, help every believer in Qyzylorda, Kazakhstan be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Karakalpak people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Spirit, cause the 212 believers in Qyzylorda to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Father, give the disciples of the the state of Qyzylorda an urgency of seeing every people and place reached for the gospel.
data.verse: As long as it is day, we must do the works of him who sent me. Night is coming, when no one can work.

data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Qyzylorda that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.
